resources.string: Fund your spending balance to enjoy instant and cheap transactions with friends, family, and merchants.
You can use your Bitkit savings or send bitcoin from a different wallet.
Bitkit does not currently provide Lightning services in your country, but you can still connect to other nodes directly.
Bitkit does not currently provide Lightning services in your country, but you can still connect to other nodes directly.
Scan a QR to claim your LNURL Channel from another LSP, or choose manual setup.
Before you can transfer funds from your savings balance, you need to send bitcoin to your Bitkit wallet.
Transfer funds to your spending balance to enjoy instant and cheap transactions with friends, family, and merchants.
Sorry, Bitkit could not set up your spending balance or complete your transfer. Please try again.
The amount you can transfer to your spending balance is currently limited to ₿ {amount}.
Your transfer to the spending balance is limited due to liquidity policy. For details, visit the Help Center.

Your Spending Balance uses the Lightning Network to make your payments cheaper, faster, and more private.

This works like internet access, but you pay for liquidity & routing instead of bandwidth.

This setup includes some one-time costs.
Transfer your spending balance to your savings to store your Bitcoin long-term and secure your future.
Funds transfer to savings is usually instant, but settlement may take up to <accent>14 days</accent> under certain network conditions.
You can transfer part of your spending balance to savings, because you have multiple active Lightning Connections.
Please wait, your funds transfer is in progress. This should take <accent>±10 seconds.</accent>
Funds were not transferred yet. Bitkit will try to initiate the transfer during the next <accent>30 minutes</accent>. Please keep your app open.
Your funds have been transferred and your spending balance is ready to use.
Your funds have been transferred. You are able to use these funds immediately.
You can use an external node to manually open a Lightning connection. Enter the node details to continue.
Lightning connection initiated. You will be able to use your spending balance in <accent>±30 minutes</accent> (depends on node configuration).
An error occurred when setting up your instant balance. {raw}
Receiving amount needs to be greater than ${usdValue}
Please wait, your funds transfer is in progress. This should take <accent>±10 minutes.</accent>
Bitkit failed to initialize the Lightning node.
Bitkit was not able to export the LDK logs.
Bitkit could not add the Lightning peer.
The URI appears to be invalid.
The Lightning peer was successfully added and saved.
The funds on your spending balance have been transferred to your savings.
Unable to transfer your funds back to savings. Please try again.
Your funds are being transferred back to your savings.

The fee to close this Lightning Connection and transfer your funds back to your savings depends on network conditions.\n\nFunds transfer to savings is usually instant, but settlement may take up to <accent>14 days</accent> under certain network conditions.
Could not initiate transfer. Do you want to force this transfer? You won’t be able to use these funds for ±14 days (!)
Your funds will be accessible in ±14 days.
Unable to transfer your funds back to savings. Please try again.
You can now pay anyone, anywhere, instantly.
The setup process expired. Please try again.
The setup process expired. Please try again.
Please wait for Bitkit to connect to the payment network (±10 seconds).
I declare that I have read and accept the <accent>terms of use.</accent>
I declare that I have read and accept the <accent>privacy policy.</accent>
Use Bitkit to pay anyone, anywhere, any time, and spend your bitcoin on the things you value in life.
Bitkit hands you the keys to manage your money. Spend now or save for later. The choice is yours.
Spend bitcoin faster than ever. Enjoy instant and cheap payments with friends, family, and merchants.
*Bitkit does not currently provide Lightning services in your country, but you can still connect to other nodes.
Take charge of your digital life with portable profiles and payable contacts.
Swipe to hide your balance, enjoy more private payments, and protect your wallet by enabling security features.
Let’s create your wallet. Please be aware that Bitkit is mobile software. <accent>Don’t store all your money in Bitkit.</accent>
You can add a secret passphrase to the 12-word recovery phrase. If you do, make sure you don’t forget.
Please type in your recovery phrase from any (paper) backup.
If a word is shown in <accent>red</accent>, it means that it was not found in the recovery phrase dictionary. Check for spelling errors.
The checksum for the recovery phrase appears to be incorrect. Please double check your recovery phrase.
*Optional, enter only if you’ve set up one.
Bitkit could not restore your wallet from backup or recovery phrase.
You have successfully restored your wallet from backup. Enjoy Bitkit!
Bitkit restored your savings, but failed to restore your current spending balance (Lightning state) and wallet data.
If you previously had a lightning backup it will be overwritten and lost. This could result in a loss of funds.
Don\'t install your Bitkit recovery phrase into multiple phones simultaneously, as this can corrupt your data.
Bitkit is not able to read this QR code.
Bitkit could not read the provided data.
Bitkit is currently set to {selectedNetwork} but data is for {dataNetwork}.
Don’t have any Bitcoin or need more?
Could not load primary key from keychain.
It appears you’re disconnected, trying to reconnect...
Lost connection to Electrum, trying to reconnect...
Bitkit successfully reconnected to the Internet.
<accent>Your wallet balance exceeds $500.</accent>\nFor your security, consider moving some of your savings to an offline wallet.
There is a critical update for Bitkit. You must update to continue using Bitkit.
Bitkit needs permission to use your camera

<bold>It appears Bitkit does not have permission to access your camera.</bold>\n\nTo utilize this feature in the future you will need to enable camera permissions for this app from your phone\'s settings.
Do you want to be redirected to the relevant screen?
More ₿ needed to pay this Bitcoin invoice.
₿ {amount} more needed to pay this Bitcoin invoice.
₿ {amount} more needed to pay this Lightning invoice.
This QR code does not appear to contain payment data.
Bitkit could not update the current Bitcoin exchange rate. Using price from {date}
Bitkit could not update the current Bitcoin exchange rate. Please try again later.
Could not start local Lightning node. Please try again or restart Bitkit.
Not enough outbound/sending capacity to complete lnurl-pay request.
An error occured when you tried paying: {raw}
Do you want open a Lightning connection with this Lightning Service Provider?
Bitkit could not connect to Blocktank.
An error occurred when you attempted to sign in. {raw}
Not enough receiving capacity to complete withdraw request.
Could not create invoice for withdraw.
Incorrect LNURL withdraw params, min/max not set correctly.
Your withdraw was successfully requested. Waiting for payment.
Unable to add LSP node as a peer at this time.
An error occurred when moving funds. {raw}
You need {delta} more to complete this transaction.
Please update Bitkit to the latest version for new features and bug fixes!
Open Bitkit to complete your transfer
Bitkit is unable to read the provided data.
Now that you have some funds in your wallet, it is time to back up your money!
There are no funds in your wallet yet, but you can create a backup if you wish.
You added a passphrase to your recovery phrase during wallet setup.
<accent>Never share</accent> your passphrase with anyone as this may result in the loss of funds.
Enter the passphrase you added while setting up and creating your wallet.
Bitkit could not read your recovery phrase.
Write down these {length} words in the right order and store them in a safe place.
Use the 12 words below to recover your money at a later date.
<accent>Never share</accent> your recovery phrase with anyone as this may result in the loss of funds.
Tap the 12 words in the correct order.
Make sure you store your recovery phrase in a <accent>secure place</accent>, as this is the <accent>only way to recover</accent> your money!
Remember, <accent>never share your recovery phrase</accent> with anyone! If you do, they can steal your money, profile and other data.
Your profile, contacts, accounts, tags, and activity will be backed up automatically to our free cloud service.
Don\'t use your Bitkit recovery phrase on multiple phones simultaneously, as this can corrupt your data.
To increase wallet security, you can set up a PIN code and Face ID.
Please use a PIN you will remember. If you forget your PIN you can reset it, but that will require restoring your wallet.
Please retype your 4-digit PIN to complete the setup process.
Try again, this is not the same PIN.
PIN code is currently enabled. If you want to disable your PIN, you need to enter your current PIN code first.
Last attempt. Entering the wrong PIN again will reset your wallet.
Forgot your PIN? Reset and recover your Bitkit wallet with your recovery phrase. Set a new PIN after completing recovery.
Please enter your PIN code to confirm and send out this payment.
It appears that your device does not support Biometric security.
Bitkit could not set up {type} for your device.
Looks like you haven’t set up biometric security yet (or it is not supported). Try to enable it in your phone settings.
PIN code set. Would you like to use {biometricsName} instead of your PIN code?
You have successfully set up a PIN code and {biometricsName} to improve wallet security.
You have successfully set up a PIN code to improve your wallet security.
Back up your wallet first to avoid loss of your funds and wallet data. Resetting will overwrite your current Bitkit setup.
Are you sure you want to reset your Bitkit Wallet? Do you have a backup of your recovery phrase and wallet data?
You\'ve entered Bitkit\'s recovery mode. Here are some actions to perform when running into issues that prevent the app from fully functioning. Restart the app for a normal startup.
You can export a copy of your wallet data as a .ZIP file. This file is encrypted with the password you set below.
Bitkit successfully exported the backup file to your phone.
Bitkit could not export the backup file to your phone.
Bitkit could not create the backup file.
You can change your PIN code to a new\n4-digit combination. Please enter your current PIN code first.
Please retype your 4-digit PIN to complete the setup process.
Please use a PIN you will remember. If you forget your PIN you can reset it, but that will require restoring your wallet.
Try again, this is not the same PIN.
You have successfully changed your PIN to a new 4-digit combination.
Bitkit has been reset and all wallet data has been deleted.
Make sure you trust this service before granting permission to manage your data.
Unable to auth with Pubky service
Developer options are now enabled throughout the app.
Developer options are now disabled throughout the app.

Thank you for being a responsible Bitcoiner.
Change your wallet, change the world.

Bitkit hands you the keys to your money, profile, contacts, and web accounts.

Bitkit was crafted by Synonym Software Ltd.
Change your wallet, change the world. Download Bitkit for iPhone {appStoreUrl} or Android {playStoreUrl}
Tip: Quickly toggle between Bitcoin and {currency} by tapping on your wallet balance.
Bitkit QuickPay makes checking out faster by automatically paying QR codes when scanned.
If enabled, scanned invoices below ${amount} will be paid automatically without requiring your confirmation or PIN*.
* Bitkit QuickPay exclusively supports payments from your Spending Balance.
Read clipboard for ease of use
When enabled, you can use {biometryTypeName} instead of your PIN code to unlock your wallet or send payments.
Bitkit failed to back up wallet data. Retrying in {interval, plural, one {# minute} other {# minutes}}.
Need help? Report your issue from within Bitkit, visit the help center, check the status, or reach out to us on our social channels.
Please describe the issue you are experiencing or ask a general question.
Describe the issue or ask a question
Thank you for contacting us! We will try to get back to you as soon as possible.
Something went wrong while trying to send your issue or question. Please try again.
Failed to complete a full backup
Changes will take full effect after app restarts.
Sort by and use smallest UTXO first. Higher fee, but hides your largest UTXO\'s.
Sort by and use largest UTXO first. Lowest fee, but reveals your largest UTXO\'s.
Use all available UTXO\'s regardless of the amount being sent. Use this method when fees are low in order to reduce fees in future transactions.
Choose how you prefer to receive money when users send funds to your profile key.
Are you sure you want to reset the suggestions? They will reappear in case you have removed them from your Bitkit wallet overview.
No funds found under the {addressType} address type, receiving addresses up to index {index}.
No funds found under the {addressType} address type, change addresses up to index {index}.
No addresses with funds found when searching for \"{searchTxt}\"
No addresses found when searching for \"{searchTxt}\"
Bitkit was not able to check the address balances.
{count, plural, one {Spend ₿ {fundsToSpend} From # address} other {Spend ₿ {fundsToSpend} From # addresses}}
{count, plural, one {Spend All Funds From # address} other {Spend All Funds From # addresses}}
Please specify a host and port to connect to.
Please specify a host to connect to.
Please specify a port to connect to.
Bitkit could not establish a connection to Electrum.
Changes will take full effect after app restarts.
You may need to restart the app once or twice for this change to take effect.
Please specify a URL to connect to.
Add a new contact by scanning their QR or by pasting their key below.
You cannot add yourself as a contact.
This is not a valid key.
Are you sure you want to delete {name} from your contacts?
Get automatic updates from your Bitkit contacts, pay them, and follow their public profiles.
Set up your public profile and links, so your Bitkit contacts can reach you or pay you anytime, anywhere.
You and your contacts can use Bitkit to send payments directly, without banks, anytime, anywhere.
Enjoy decentralized feeds from your favorite web services, by adding fun and useful widgets to your Bitkit wallet.
Please note that all your profile information will be publicly available and visible.
Short bio. Say a bit about yourself.
Note: Any link you add will be publicly visible.
Are you sure you want to delete all of your Bitkit profile information?
Your Bitkit profile information has been deleted.
Please select which fields you want to display in the {name} widget.
Are you sure you want to delete ‘{name}‘ from your widgets?
The contact you’re trying to send to hasn’t enabled payments.
Slashauth is deprecated. Please use Bitkit Beta.
Please reopen the app and try again.
Please double-check if your recovery phrase is accurate.
Enter a Bitcoin or Lightning invoice or address
Please copy an address or an invoice.
The maximum spendable amount is a bit lower due to a required reserve balance.
It appears you are sending over $100. Do you want to continue?
It appears you are sending over 50% of your total balance. Do you want to continue?
The transaction fee appears to be over 50% of the amount you are sending. Do you want to continue?
The transaction fee appears to be over $10. Do you want to continue?

Current network conditions require that your fee should be greater than {minimumFee} ₿/vbyte. This transaction may fail, take a while to confirm, or get trimmed from the mempool. Do you wish to proceed?
This payment is taking a bit longer than expected. You can continue using Bitkit.
Unfortunately contact could not be paid instantly. You can try a regular payment (more expensive, slower).
Unable to broadcast the transaction. Please try again.
Bitkit was unable to find the transaction data.
No transaction is available to broadcast.
Please check your transaction info and try again.
Please increase your fee and try again.
The amount is greater than your current balance.
The amount indicated does not allow a fee to be included.
Lower the custom fee and try again.
Increase the custom fee and try again.
Please increase your send amount to proceed.
Please remove UTXO\'s or increase your send amount to proceed.
Unable to decrease the fee any further.
Bitkit was unable to find the transaction data.
Your instant payment was sent successfully.
Your instant payment failed. Please try again.
To set up your spending balance, a <accent>{networkFee}</accent> network fee and <accent>{serviceFee}</accent> service provider fee will be deducted.

To receive more instant Bitcoin, Bitkit has to increase your liquidity. A <accent>{networkFee}</accent> network fee and <accent>{serviceFee}</accent> service provider fee will be deducted from the amount you specified.

Your Spending Balance uses the Lightning Network to make your payments cheaper, faster, and more private.

This works like internet access, but you pay for liquidity & routing instead of bandwidth.

This setup includes some one-time costs.

Your Spending Balance uses the Lightning Network to make your payments cheaper, faster, and more private.

This works like internet access, but you pay for liquidity & routing instead of bandwidth.

Bitkit needs to increase the receiving capacity of your spending balance to process this payment.
Failed to send funds to your spending account.
Receive some funds to get started
Bitkit was not able to fetch the transaction data.
Please check your activity list. The {count} impacted transaction(s) will be highlighted in red.
Bitkit was unable to boost the transaction.
Your transaction may settle faster if you include an additional network fee. Set your custom fee below.
Your transaction may settle faster if you include an additional network fee. Here is a recommendation:
An error occurred. Please try again {raw}
An error occurred when broadcasting your transaction. {raw}
Please check your connection and try again.\n{message}
{count, plural, one {# of your transactions is no longer confirmed.} other {# of your transactions are no longer confirmed.}} Please wait.
Please check your activity list for affected transactions.
The funds you withdraw will be deposited into your Bitkit spending balance.
The minimum amount for this invoice is ₿ {amount}.
Swipe your wallet balance to reveal it again.
Tap your wallet balance to switch it back to {unit}.
An error occurred and couldn\'t refresh the wallet. Please try again.
Electrum server connection is throttled. Please wait several minutes before trying again.
Insufficient receiving capacity to receive this amount over Lightning.
Payments to your spending balance might fail if you switch between apps.
